General.Name: Gentrogroup Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Csa Cosmic Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of cosmetics in South Korea. It is also involved in the manufacturing construction materials, as well as in the specialized construction works. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
